column4: hi, got a small issue. when playing games I sometimes get locked in a game in fullscreen mode when shutting the game down and end up ctrl-alt-f4 ing to get a command line to reboot. is there a key that would switch between screen modes so i cant easly shutdown the game with rebooting?
hello. you might try something like... ctrl+alt+f2
then to get back to X... ctrl+alt+f7
